Yes, I deleted the 3 example folders.

Those planets look absolutely awesome.

However one problem, this mod seems to break Ferram Aerospace Research (the improved aerodynamics mod), if I turn off Urania FAR works fine, however when Urania is loaded

FAR stops working.

In this case this can't be the cause of the pack, but only of the mod.

Maybe ask the question to the mod thread.

Sido - you're really awesome. Obviously we all love this mod a lot and hope to get it working smooth. Can you please go back to this post and answer the questions in it? I know you're busy so I really appreciate your time very much. Cheers!

Well no because I have PlanetFactory CE installed, and FAR only breaks if I select the Urania system.

It works just fine for the Sentar Expansion.

Well no because I have PlanetFactory CE installed, and FAR only breaks if I select the Urania system.

It works just fine for the Sentar Expansion.

Well, the pack use the same arguments than those use by the sentar system... not more. That's strange again, anyway planetfactory Ce is in a really alpha State so i'don't really know.

Remember that's is just a pack, not a plugin, this pack don't use any dll so i don't think it can enter in conflict with an other mod. i can be wrong of course but it's strange.

Maybe it's the clouds ? i don't use FAR so i can't tell you.

Sido - you're really awesome. Obviously we all love this mod a lot and hope to get it working smooth. Can you please go back to this post and answer the questions in it? I know you're busy so I really appreciate your time very much. Cheers!

LINK: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/66882-0-23-Sido-s-Urania-System-16-new-planets-and-moon-%21?p=943671&viewfull=1#post943671

If you follow the instruction, there's no problem, a lot of people do it right.

If you got a problem, it's that you doing something wrong.

I install this pack on a clean ksp install without any problems so i think you can do too.

And once again, my installation is very heavy with a lot of mod on a 5 years old computer with 8 Gb of ram :

My game is really smooth and i don't have any problems :

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0omJtU9W3X0

i'm sorry but the answer i already give you is the best i can give to your problem.
